person.persName: Christopher C. Hardwick (Hopkins County, KY, assistant marshal )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, assistant marshal and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Catharine Hardwick. Father of Gustavus Hardwick. Married to Adelaide "Addie" Henson Hardwick in Crittenden County, Kentucky, on November 22, 1859. Father of John C. Hardwick and Robert L. Hardwick. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Postmaster of Madisonville in Hopkins County from June 30, 1854, to December 17, 1856. Postmaster of Madisonville from December 30, 1857, to January 19, 1858. Assistant marshal in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.
